mapper.select: select isbn, title, author, content, time from qna
select isbn, title, author, content, time from qna where isbn=#{isbn}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(isbn, title, author, content, time) values (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{content} ,#{time})
mapper.update: update qna set title=#{title}, author=#{author}, content=#{content}, time=#{time} where isbn=#{isbn}
